```{r}
df <- read.csv('dataset\\Invistico_Airline.csv')
dim(df)
```

```{r}
na_count = sum(is.na(df))
df <- na.omit(df)
cat('number of rows removed:', na_count)
```


```{r}
sapply(df,function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
sapply(df, function(x) length(unique(x)))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
p = ggplot(df, aes(x = Checkin.service)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = satisfaction))
p
```
